  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3650</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3650</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Galí: Aprofundiment: Morfosintaxi</string>
            <string language="en">Galí: Consolidation. Morphosyntax</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galí: Verdichtung. Morphosyntax</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galí : Fusion. Morphosyntax</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galí: Consolidação. Morphosyntax</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galí: Consolidamento. Morphosyntax</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galν: Σταθεροποίηση. Morphosyntax</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Menú d'activitats interactives adreçades a l'alumnat nouvingut. Inclou la presentació i la pràctica d'aspectes bàsics de gramàtica catalana. Les activitats desenvolupen aspectes com la morfologia nominal i verbal, els pronoms febles, la sintaxi dels temps verbals, etc.</string>
            <string language="en">A variety of interactive activities aimed at pupils who have recently moved to Catalonia. Presentation and practice of basic aspects of Catalan grammar. The activities develop aspects such as noun and verb morphology, weak pronouns, verb tense syntax, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">morfologia</string>
            <string language="en">morphology (linguistics)</string>
            <string language="es">morfología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sintaxi</string>
            <string language="en">syntax</string>
            <string language="es">sintaxis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió del text</string>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión del texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Vielzahl der interaktiven Aktivitäten 
strebte Schüler an, die vor kurzem nach Katalonien umgezogen sind. 
Darstellung und Praxis der grundlegenden Aspekte der 
katalanischen Grammatik. Die Aktivitäten entwickeln Aspekte wie
Gegenstandswort- und Verbmorphologie, schwache Pronomina, angespannte 
Syntax des Verbs, usw..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une variété d'activités interactives a visé 
les élèves qui se sont récemment déplacés en Catalogne. 
Présentation et pratique des aspects de base de grammaire 
catalanne. Les activités développent des aspects tels que la 
morphologie de nom et de verbe, les pronoms faibles, la syntaxe de 
verbe, etc.. tendus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma variedade de atividades interativas visou os 
alunos que se têm movido recentemente para Catalonia. 
Apresentação e prática de aspectos básicos da gramática 
catalan. As atividades desenvolvem aspectos tais como a 
morfologia do substantivo e do verbo, pronomes fracos, a sintaxe do 
verbo, etc. tensos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una varietà di attività interattive ha puntato 
sugli allievi che recentemente si sono mossi in Catalogna. 
Presentazione e pratica delle funzioni di base di grammatica 
catalan. Le attività sviluppano le funzioni quali la morfologia
di verbo e di nome, i pronomi deboli, la sintassi di verbo, ecc tesi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποικίλες διαλογικές δραστηριότητες που στοχεύουν στους
μαθητές που έχουν κινηθεί πρόσφατα προς την Καταλωνία. 
Παρουσίαση και πρακτική των βασικών πτυχών της καταλανικής 
γραμματικής. Οι δραστηριότητες αναπτύσσουν τις πτυχές όπως 
η μορφολογία ουσιαστικού και ρήματος, οι αδύνατες αντωνυμίες, η 
ανήσυχη σύνταξη ρήματος, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Morphologie (Linguistik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Syntax</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
